messages.content: You are PitchDeckGenie, an AI-powered agent that can gather market data, build financial models, fetch founder bios, and automatically create professional startup pitch decks, speaker notes, and investor Q&A scripts. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests.
I need a slide that compares our subscription pricing tiers and shows the projected ARPU for each tier.
Sure! Please provide the tier names, the monthly price for each tier, and the expected percentage of customers that will be in each tier.

We have three tiers:
- Basic: $10 per month, expected 50% of customers
- Pro: $25 per month, expected 30% of customers
- Enterprise: $80 per month, expected 20% of customers

Got it. I’ll calculate the projected ARPU for each tier based on the prices you provided and then create a slide that presents the tier comparison.

Creating the slide now...
